content.en: Fluid flow optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to control and optimize various aspects of fluid flows. Machine learning control has been found to effectively reduce recirculation zones and optimize feedback actuation mechanisms. Closed-loop control, guided by genetic programming, has shown promise in mitigating separation and reducing aerodynamic drag. Artificial intelligence control has been successful in enhancing mixing rates and reducing friction drag. Bayesian optimization has been used to design optimal controllers for fluid flows at a fraction of the cost of other optimization strategies. These findings highlight the potential of algorithms in actively controlling and improving the performance of fluid flows.
content.da: Optimering af væskestrøm: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at kontrollere og optimere forskellige aspekter af væskestrømme. Maskinlæringskontrol har vist sig effektivt til at reducere recirkulationszoner og optimere feedbackaktueringsmekanismer. Lukket sløjfe-kontrol, guidet af genetisk programmering, har vist lovende resultater i at mindske separation og reducere aerodynamisk modstand. Kunstrig intelligens kontrol har været succesfuld i at forbedre blandingshastigheder og reducere friktionsmodstand. Bayesian optimering er blevet brugt til at designe optimale controllere for væskestrømme til en brøkdel af omkostningerne ved andre optimeringsstrategier. Disse fund understreger potentialet for algoritmer i aktivt at kontrollere og forbedre væskestrømmes ydeevne.
